The so-called trial, we have to have a certain time limit, generally not less than 3 minutes, there will be no COINS given less than 3 minutes. Points can be regarded as experience value, the more complete the task of integrating the more, the higher the rank. Integral and the currency is a 1:1 relationship can be mutual conversion. (not a VIP member have to complete a task 2 points and VIP member to complete a task to get 10 points)
No task type can be set
Page shows the Unfinish task of type:
Page shows the Finish task of type:
Page shows the Dated task of type:
Page shows the Unfinish task of priority:
Page shows the Finish task of priority:
Page shows the Dated task of priority:

《Hold Time》 is designed to help you better manage the time, you can easily record your Hold a day, at the same time have a memo to remind, all kinds of human functions such as task type classification
Unfinish：Show unfinished tasks, whether for expired tasks shows that you can set (page shows overdue unfinished) is to make the display overdue tasks, if you don\'t want to display can be set to no
Finish：According to task, no matter have not expired. Through the long press a task, or tasks to reset or remove one day

Reminder：A single task reminder, set to yes, will be like an alarm clock in you to set the time to remind you that you create task, cycle to remind is set to, can according to you to set the cycle time, cycle remind you how many task has been finished, how many have expired, so that you adjust the task schedule, adjust the efficiency, etc

Show：Message to remind cover before, when there is a message to remind, the task bar (title) of your mobile will have prompt, and when you set up to create a multiple tasks, there will be more prompt, if you are not clear, can show multiple reminder, if you are set to, so later will remind cover before

Function extension: to urge users to create a task every day, and finish the work in time. "Hold time" joined the ranks and playful functions such as network ranking. The higher the integral, ranking the top, and the higher level. Integral can be completed on time you create a task, to obtain, or try to get COINS, such as game currency integration, to achieve the level of ascension. Become a VIP member, can not only get more huge function, but also make you more likely to win points, the faster level rise

Promotion: respect of customer, if you are satisfied with the Hold time function, you can share with your friends, lift a finger, send person rose, the hand leaves lingering fragrance. We will give you 50 COINS, also can give praise to the app store
Feedback: you can put your opinion of the software, advice, or don\'t understand the place of feedback to us, we will contact you within 1 working day
